txt.en: 'If my eyes see true, it is almost as if you strive to see Stangard fall into ruin, Sithric.'
'The king will hear of this insolence!!'
'Stanric, our true leader, is within. Alas, that you will likely need to hear Sithric as well. These are troubled times in Stangard.'
'Come, let us deal with this now.'
'[placeholder] has done much for our outpost, with two hands only.'
'What is the meaning of this, Stanric?'
'Gone are the days when I feared my king so much that my men could starve at his bidding.'
'Never again shall the edges of Rohan be allowed to grow feral...'
'There are no secrets, Sithric. I have no wish to avoid you.'
'...while we sit here with our hands bound.'
'No? Then why do you and [placeholder] not speak openly?'
'You will defy me, the envoy of Th√©oden King?'
'Indeed I will, when your objections are nonsense!'
'Oh, worry not! I will be forthcoming now.'
